testcase.classname: feature to Test the Item Master Screen functionality
testcase.name: Verify the Add Items functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed When User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And User click on the Item Master under the Masters Module..................passed And User click on the Add button............................................passed Then User Select the Company name"Srikar Biotech"...........................passed And User Select the Category"Pesticides Products"...........................passed And User Select the Items...................................................passed Then User Click on the Save Button..........................................passed
